titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 111) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2003, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-694, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 111 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 217.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 585, H. Res. 550 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 9/25/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.J. Res. 111 (FY 2003 continuing appropriations).
